name: KDA Alpha
description:
Latest Version (0.0.8)

Backstory :

I've been working on making games for a while, I've never really had a concrete backstory for any of my games/projects.

This one I do. A friend of mine has had a comic book in the making for quite some time now and this game is loosely based off of that.

Update goals :

  • Add character customization.
  • Add custom art to the site.
  • Add voice-overs for some of the characters.
  • Add more animations.
  • Add more ui with animations.
  • Add more weapons.
  • Fix some of the animations.

Current Known Bugs :

Pressing the back button in the pause menu and then returning to the game will result in the animations for the character being frozen.

On the odd occasion some UI will reroute to the wrong panel.
